ygData.subject: Need partner to lvl at WK (Innoruuk server)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi guys, I ve tested last night, from I login till I logout, I can solo both Ulir and Ein at WK using DD and Jboot.  However, the down time is too long (Ulir
ygData.messageBody:
Hi guys,

I've tested last night, from I login till I logout, I can solo both Ulir
and Ein at WK using DD and Jboot. However, the down time is too long (Ulir
need 2.5 bubb mana on avaerage, and Ein need 4 bubb mana). The worst case
is I managed to kill Ein with OOM.

Considering the long down time of mediating after taking every Ein, I
invited a lvl 31 driud, helping him to snare Ulir for him to kite. Then
once he finish Ulir, I will start on Ein.

This is a pretty good lvling method, as both of us enjoyed fast xp last
night. Now I would like to invite any lvl 30ish member who can join me for
training. I dun mind taking more fraction hits for snaring Ulir, coz the
loneliness is really driving me mad, esp when the perverts are not online
to spam the guildsay.

Another alternative is another lvl 35-40 member, we team and take Ulir and
Ein together. Shouldn't be a problem, this method dun even need kiting.

So, anyone interested?


Ziltus
The lonely kiting pervert in WK

p/s: My login time will be S'pore time 9pm till 1am. So guys, I'm coming
back for good. Any spare stuffs pls donate to me lah! ;P
